Languages.RPGMode_Refused: RPG Mode is now refused on this server:

Languages.CommandDescription_Exit: Stop the save the world then exit program.
Languages.CommandDescription_SaveAll: Save all world data and backup.
Languages.CommandDescription_OnlinePlayers: List active players (also: who, players, playing, online).
Languages.CommandDescription_Me: Broadcast a message in third person.
Languages.CommandDescription_Say: Broadcast a message as the Server.
Languages.CommandDescription_Slots: Display information about occupied player slots.
Languages.CommandDescription_Kick: Kick a player by name or slot.
Languages.CommandDescription_Ban: Ban a player by Name or IP
Languages.CommandDescription_UnBan: UnBan a player by Name or IP
Languages.CommandDescription_Whitelist: Add or remove a player or IP to the whitelist
Languages.CommandDescription_Time: Change the time of the World.
Languages.CommandDescription_Help: Get a printout of active commands.
Languages.CommandDescription_SpawnNpc: Spawn an NPC near a player.
Languages.CommandDescription_Teleport: Teleport a player to another player.
Languages.CommandDescription_NpcSpawns: Toggle the state of NPC Spawning.
Languages.CommandDescription_Purge: Purge the map of items, NPCs or projectiles.
Languages.CommandDescription_Plugin: Enable/disable and get details about specific plugins.
Languages.CommandDescription_SpawnBoss: Summon a Boss to the world.
Languages.CommandDescription_ItemRej: Add or remove an item from the whitelist.
Languages.CommandDescription_Explosions: Toggle the allowing of explosions for the server.
Languages.CommandDescription_MaxPlayers: Set the maximum number of player slots.
Languages.CommandDescription_Refresh: Redownload the area around you from the server.
Languages.CommandDescription_HardMode: Toggle hardmode for the current world
